backend/main.mo: Defines the backend actor with authorization, blob storage, and a large set of geography, proposal, and profile types plus helpers for initializing empty US geography data.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented features with metadata, linking feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and test requirements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides concise summaries of many frontend project files including docs, hooks, components, and styles for quick reference.
frontend/docs/ARCHITECTURE.md: Describes Whisper’s overall system architecture, installation hierarchy model, canister mapping, and modular subsystem design principles.
frontend/docs/COMPLAINT_CATEGORY_SUGGEST: Specifies the complaint category suggestion system including backend category storage, data structures, and frontend integration expectations.
frontend/docs/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide detailing prerequisites, configuration, and instructions for deploying the app to the Internet Computer.
frontend/docs/HOMEPAGE_REDESIGN_NOTES.md: Documents homepage redesign updates including hero section assets, color/contrast fixes, and typography and layout improvements.
frontend/docs/PHASED_PLAN.md: Outlines a multi-phase development plan for Whisper, detailing deliverables, non-goals, and scaling hooks from prototype to multi-installation system.
frontend/docs/SECRETARY_NAVIGATION_HOOKS: Describes the registry system for registering and navigating destinations within the Secretary assistant.
frontend/docs/SMOKE_TEST_INSTANCE_FOLLOW: Provides a full smoke test for proposal creation, moderation, issue reporting, task workflows, and regression checks.
frontend/docs/SMOKE_TEST_REGRESSION_PATC: Lists regression-focused smoke tests covering logo fixes, navigation, Secretary flows, and base-path deployment.
frontend/docs/SMOKE_TEST_SECRETARY_FLOWS: Defines smoke tests for all Secretary assistant flows including discovery, issue reporting, keyword routing, and recovery.
frontend/docs/STYLE_GUIDE.md: Specifies Whisper’s visual design system including principles, color palette, typography, and accessibility rules.
frontend/index.css: Empty stylesheet placeholder for global frontend styles.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell that mounts the app and loads the main TypeScript entrypoint.
frontend/public/whisper-logo-teal.svg: SVG asset containing the teal Whisper logo with geometric and symbolic elements.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling routing, secretary widget behavior, query client setup, and lazy-loaded pages.
frontend/src/components/common/HomeHeade: Header with navigation, authentication controls, and mobile menu that updates routing via history API.
frontend/src/components/common/IconBubbl: Reusable styled circular icon container supporting size and color variants.
frontend/src/components/common/LoadingIn: Standardized spinner with optional label and size settings for loading states.
frontend/src/components/common/LoginButt: Login/logout button integrating Internet Identity auth with loading state and icon changes.
frontend/src/components/common/UserProfi: User dropdown showing avatar, profile navigation, and logout, using caller profile query data.
frontend/src/components/create-instance/: Form card for creating an instance with auto-generated names, validation, and proposal submission.
County selector fetching counties by state and rendering options with loading and error handling.
Dropdown component that loads and selects places for a given county, handling loading and error states.
Dropdown for selecting a US state using fetched state data with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/issue-project/Is: Dialog showing issue project details, category, status, geography, and a tasks tab for a proposal.
Tasks tab allowing creation, display, and status updates of tasks for an issue project.
frontend/src/components/proposals/Propos: Dialog showing detailed proposal information, loading live data, and linking to its Issue Project view.
Section listing all proposals with loading/error states and a dialog for viewing proposal details.
frontend/src/components/secretary/Secret: UI card prompting users to open the Secretary assistant, with dismiss and open actions.
A searchable typeahead component that filters options, supports keyboard navigation, and triggers selection callbacks.
Main interactive secretary widget that drives flow logic, loads geography and proposal data, and integrates with the FlowEngineBrain.
Creates a portal-mounted wrapper for rendering the SecretaryWidget into an overlay root.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance tied to the current identity and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
Fetches and saves the caller’s user profile with identity-scoped caching and mutation invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useComplaintSuggestio: Fetches complaint category suggestions and lists based on geography level using backend actor queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateInstanceProp: Validates and submits new instance proposals and checks name availability, invalidating proposal queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentPath.ts: Tracks the current SPA route path and updates on browser navigation events.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Debounces a value by a configurable delay to reduce rapid updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeleteProposal.ts: Provides a mutation to delete proposals and invalidates moderation and proposal queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useHideProposal.ts: Provides a mutation to hide proposals and invalidates moderation and proposal queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, including login state and identity persistence.
Implements task CRUD hooks using react-query, supporting fetching, creating, and updating tasks with optimistic UI updates.
Custom hook that syncs React state with localStorage, safely handling SSR and JSON parsing errors.
frontend/src/hooks/useModerationItems.ts: Fetches and maps backend moderation queue items into UI-friendly structures with react-query, handling loading and errors.
frontend/src/hooks/usePreloadedImage.ts: Preloads an image URL and exposes ready/error state, resetting when the source changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of react-query hooks for user profiles, proposals, admin checks, geography lookups, and related backend queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useSecretaryChat.ts: Manages simple chat state for a secretary assistant UI, including messages and menu visibility.
frontend/src/hooks/useSecretaryNavigatio: Provides a registry for navigable destinations, supporting registration, keyword lookup, and programmatic navigation.
frontend/src/hooks/useSetIssueProjectCat: Temporary client-side workaround to store and retrieve issue project categories via localStorage with related query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpdateProposalStat: Hook using react-query to update proposal status with validation and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useUSGeography.ts: React-query hooks for fetching states, counties, and places from the backend, with robust empty-result handling and caching.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining color variables, theming, utilities, and layout helpers.
frontend/src/lib/formatProposalGeography: Helpers to format proposal geography, population, and readable location strings.
frontend/src/lib/secretaryNavigation.ts: Defines Secretary navigation options with keyword matching and deep-link utilities.
frontend/src/lib/secretaryReportIssueDat: Fetches geography details and top issues from backend with structured results and fallbacks.
frontend/src/lib/secretaryTopIssuesMessa: Class providing formatted top-issue messages for states, counties, and cities with backend lookups.
frontend/src/lib/uiCopy.ts: Centralized UI text constants for product, navigation, proposals, and Secretary flows.
frontend/src/lib/whisperInstanceNaming.t: Provides helpers to generate, validate, normalize, and extract geography from WHISPER-prefixed instance names.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminModeration: Admin interface for checking admin status and moderating proposals with approve, reject, hide, and delete actions.
frontend/src/pages/admin/components/Mode: Displays a table of moderation items with status badges, category icons, and action confirmations.
frontend/src/pages/GeographyPage.tsx: Renders a geography placeholder page with navigation back to home.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Implements user profile editing with name and image upload, using identity hooks and backend mutations.
frontend/src/secretary/brain/FlowEngineB: Implements the SecretaryBrain using a flow engine with intent classification, slot filling, navigation, and geography data.
frontend/src/secretary/brain/hooks.ts: Provides utilities to compose and filter flow event listeners, including multicast, no-op, logging, and type-filtered listeners.
frontend/src/secretary/brain/SecretaryBr: Defines the SecretaryBrain interface for handling user input, actions, messages, events, and context.
frontend/src/secretary/copy/secretaryCop: Defines static English UI copy and prompt templates for menu, discovery, reporting issues, intent flows, and error handling.
frontend/src/secretary/copy/secretaryPro: Generates dynamic prompt strings for issues, discovery results, unknown input, and slot-filling based on location and context.
frontend/src/secretary/decisions/secreta: Implements pure branching logic for determining next nodes, geography resolution, instance existence, and report-issue validation.
frontend/src/secretary/flow/flows.ts: Declares all Secretary conversation nodes with UI view models and enter actions for menu, discovery, and report issue flows.
frontend/src/secretary/flow/runner.ts: Controls flow execution by handling actions, transitions, node lifecycle events, and emitting flow events, producing updated view models.
frontend/src/secretary/flow/types.ts: Defines core flow engine types including nodes, transitions, actions, context shape, view models, and event listener interfaces.
frontend/src/secretary/intent/flowRegist: Defines and registers intent flows with required slots, prompt order, and completion behaviors.
frontend/src/secretary/intent/flowRunner: Runs intent flows by determining missing slots, generating prompts, filling slots, and executing completion actions.
frontend/src/secretary/intent/index.ts: Barrel file re-exporting all intent-related modules.
frontend/src/secretary/intent/intentClas: Classifies user text into intents using keyword matching and detects intent-trigger-like input.
frontend/src/secretary/intent/repair.ts: Detects repair messages, identifies which slot to correct, and applies slot updates with dependency clearing.
Manages slot values with utilities to set, clear, reset dependents, and check filled status.
frontend/src/secretary/intent/types.ts: Defines Secretary intents, slot types, slot bags, and intent-related context structures.
frontend/src/secretary/state/secretaryCo: Manages full conversation state, providing initialization, reset, messaging, and slot-reset helpers.
frontend/src/secretary/ui/secretaryViewM: Transforms view models into UI-friendly structures and maps icon names to identifiers.
frontend/src/utils/assetUrl.ts: Safely resolves asset URLs using the app's base path.
frontend/src/utils/secretaryProjectNavig: Provides custom event helpers for signaling navigation from the Secretary to project views.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters across routing modes and session storage.
frontend/src/utils/userFacingError.ts: Maps various backend error messages to short user-friendly strings covering auth, moderation, geography, tasks, profiles, and network issues.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, animations, typography, dark mode, and extended theme settings.
project_state.json: Stores project state, goals, and implemented features for a client-side AI Secretary with intent and slot-based flows.
